comments:
I200412011139

checked out ant plugins in background. While waiting for that to finish went 
to LCD to create a JUnit plugin test config. Changed the name of the config 
and waited for the ant tests plugin to appear in my workspace. Got a prompt 
telling me that the config had changed, I clicked "OK" to save the changes.
Got the following error... 

Error 2004-12-02 13:11:53.687 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".

The project must have added shared configuration, which the dialog assumed was 
one the user had created from the dialog. We should ignore configuration added 
(at least, do not auto-select them) from other processes.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 163410 ***
